pr_title: Show "include in auto downloads" checkbox on adding podcast

timeline.message: show "include in auto downloads" checkbox on adding podcast

timeline.bodyText: Is this needed? I think the checkbox is only displayed if auto download is enabled, anyway.
timeline.author: ByteHamster

timeline.bodyText: Could you please move setting the visibility to one central location? I am having a hard time understanding why it needs to be modified here and in the else branch.
timeline.author: ByteHamster

timeline.bodyText: This still modifies the margins from Java code, which is not really elegant (and does not work correctly, depending on screen resolution). Could you please try to find a way to do this from XML?
timeline.author: ByteHamster

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to do this in XML, too. On my device, the line is executed again just before the settings are updated. That results in all feeds having autodl enabled, regardless of what you do with the checkbox
timeline.author: ByteHamster
